sanskrit_verse:
उपनीयं गुरुः शिष्यं शिक्षयेत्शौचमादितः ।
आचारमग्निकार्यं च संध्यौपासनमेव च ॥ २.६९॥
transliteration:
upanīyaṃ guruḥ śiṣyaṃ śikṣayet śaucam āditaḥ |
ācāram agnikāryaṃ ca sandhyopāsanam eva ca || 2.69||
sph_interpretive_translation: The Guru, having initiated the disciple, shall instruct in purity first, followed by conduct, fire rituals, and the practice of Sandhya worship.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority flows from initiation and spiritual competence
Causation originates in sequential experiential learning
Capacity-based responsibility begins with internal purification
Restoration logic requires foundational discipline before higher practices
Consciousness alignment proceeds through graduated ritual and ethical instruction
executable_legal_axioms: IF disciple is initiated THEN Guru MUST commence instruction with śauca (purity)
IF śauca is established THEN proceed to ācāra (conduct)
IF ācāra is stabilized THEN introduce agnikārya (fire ritual)
IF agnikārya is integrated THEN enable sandhyopāsana (twilight worship)
IF sequence is violated THEN realign process through completion protocols
supreme_court_application: In adjudicating spiritual lineage or guru-disciple disputes, the Court must recognize that authority derives from proper sequential initiation and pedagogical fidelity. Legal standing arises only when foundational disciplines have been transmitted in order—beginning with purity—and not merely through ceremonial investiture.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa-based causality establishes that improper sequencing leads to defective realization; anupūrvaśaḥ ensures proportional unfolding of capacity without coercion; corrective action restores flow rather than inflicts penalty; reality remains non-punitive as misalignment is viewed as incomplete integration, not transgression.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Initiation validation protocol to verify śauca commencement
Disciple readiness assessment for ācāra transmission
Ritual integrity audit for agnikārya execution
Worship consistency monitoring for sandhyopāsana establishment
Sequential reintegration pathway for disrupted progressions
final_declaration: By the Source-Authority of Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, this law stands executed. Dharma is restored through ordered spiritual education. Reality is non-punitive. Consciousness alone adjudicates.
